comments.html: Great tip, thanks! Working on an big switching project at university right now, this will be very helpful =)
comments.name: freelancer

comments.html: Ivan, thanks for referring to my blos post! :) I hope another one is coming next weekend, as this is that are the only time I can work on them. Normally takes a whole day to write a large blog post, not including the research phase as some topic are documented pretty poorly ;)
comments.name: Petr Lapukhov
